document_data.name: Ulvur's Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulvur's Lane''' was a small street found in the [[Baldur's Gate/Bloomridge|Bloomridge]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] that ran along the [[Old Wall (Baldur's Gate)|Old Wall]]'s southern side.
document_data.Description: Ulvur's Lane began at the [[Gond Gate]] in Bloomridge, which connected the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower]] and [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper Cities]], and ran west, along the Old Wall for two blocks and ending at the [[House of the Lute]]. The House of the Lute was a [[kaeth]] house inside the building that stood against the Old Wall, cutting the shaded lane short.
